official.headline: BCI Integrity Confirmed
official.anchor_line: Council assures citizens that recent system disclosures are part of routine transparency measures prompted by Halden’s passing.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s leadership remains committed to responsible innovation and continuous improvement for all residents.

underground.headline: Halden’s Last Stand
underground.anchor_line: Halden’s death wasn’t an accident — it cracked open the system, flooding Stenograd with buried truths.
underground.contextual_reframing: Exposed files show Council abuse and BCI targeting; officials scramble, while anger explodes on Stenograd’s streets.
